button.name: action_boq_revision
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to make revisions for each BOQ selected?

button.name: update_prices
button.help: Recompute all prices based on this pricelist
button.confirm: This will update all unit prices based on the currently set pricelist.

field.name: help
field.p: No Quotation found. Let's create one!

Once the quotation is confirmed by the customer, it becomes a sales order.
You will be able to create an invoice and collect the payment.
